subSections.title: Readings
Etymology
subSections.text: The {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||stem or continuative form}} of verb {{m|ja|戀ふ|tr=ko<sub>1</sub>pu||to [[love]], [[yearn]]}}.
